title: Chris Colfer / Parotitis & Hip Surgery
description: Sean reveals the truth about his torn meniscus. Hint: He doesn’t have one. Chris Colfer “spits” out his parotitis story and why he feels no glee about his hip surgery.
author: info@hazymills.com (Hazy Mills Network)
